alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Prentiss (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:55PM CDT until June 16 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mantachie, or near Fulton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fulton, Mantachie, Fairview, Sandy Springs, Clay, Marietta, Abney, Dorsey, Ballardsville and Kirkville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
